item.description:
Let's have some fun bowling. This place can get packed so we'll get an early jump on the night. We'll gather on the top floor, meet and great, then let the games begin. A max of 6-8 people can bowl per lane so we'll split into smaller groups for bowling. After bowling we can head downstairs and check out the lounge and pool tables.

Travel:

Parking: The area has free street parking after 8 so if you find a meter around 6pm, the most you'll pay is $2.50 (bring quarters). For cash lots and T directions, visit http://jilliansboston.com/contact/#directions.

Finding Us:

Look for us near the top floor entrance between the bar and the bowling rental booth early on. If you arrive late, you may have to search for us.

Note:

Always check the event page the day of the meetup to see if any details change. Last minute changes will be posted to the site and sent via email to those that RSVPed.

Â
item.name: Bowling, Pool, and Fun
